'''Automatons''' are enemies that are mechanical in nature. The majority of Automatons are [[Ruin Machines]], although Automatons of different origin exist.

==Types==
{{Enemy Table}}

===Ruin Machines===
{{Main|Ruin Machines}}
Most automatons are Ruin Machines, which are divided into the [[Humanoid Ruin Machines]] and the [[Ruin Sentinels]]. These war machines are often found patrolling ruins, remnants from the fallen nation of [[Khaenri'ah]]. They mostly deal {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

===Primal Constructs===
{{Main|Primal Construct}}

Primal Constructs are a form of automatons that were developed by the [[Scarlet King]]'s civilization. They mostly deal {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

==Trivia==
*Although not listed in the [[Archive]], the [[Defense Mechanism]]s mainly found in [[Dragonspine]] also can be considered as Automaton-like enemies. Like the Maguu Kenki, they are likely unrelated to the Ruin Machines.
*Apart from the Maguu Kenki, all Automaton bosses drop elemental gems that they have no natural affinity with.
